item.title: Python for Lingo programmers
item.description: A long time ago, I used to develop projects using Macromedia/Adobe Director. I was primarily a programmer and so I used to spend a lot of time writing code in Lingo. Lingo was a a language less concerned with formalism than it was in flexibility. You could coerce any variable type into another variable type and, as a result, it was a lot of fun to use.
